comments.creator: kdevel@vogtner.de
comments.text:
User Agent:  

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open http://www.rskey.org/detail.asp?manufacturer=Hewlett-Packard&model=HP-48SX
2. Right-click at Link "Forensic"
3. In the alert click OK.
4. Move mouse over "Open in New Tab".
5. Wait a few seconds.
6. Left-click.


Actual results:

4. Menu entry is not selected.
5. A tooltip is shown.
6. Nothing.


Expected results:

4. Menu entry is selected.
5. No tooltip is shown.
6. Link is opened in new window.
comments.author: kdevel@vogtner.de

comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110829 Firefox/9.0a1
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110822 Firefox/9.0a1

Reproducible on Mac OS X 10.6 and Ubuntu 10.4 on the latest trunk using the steps from comment 0. On MAC, the tooltip is not displayed. All other expected results appear as described in comment 0.

Not reproducible on Windows, as the menu does not appear after clicking OK on the alert.

Setting resolution to New.

See comment 3 for regression range.
